@banukaknight:
Dude, Caprio has changed QUITE a lot from his Titanic days. I totally get what you're saying though cos I was also avoiding him like the plague after Titanic - but check him out in Aviator, The departed, revolutionary road, Shutter Island, Blood Diamond, Catch me if you can, Gangs of New York & this film and you will have a VERY different view of this guy. thank god he gave up the stupid romantic persona. Looks like he himself was fed up of the kind of attention he got after titanic and made a conscious decision to change all that. Must watch this! - try to watch on Blu Ray and if possible on a really big screen/projector. Not doing this movie justice watching first time on a small screen!
